CustomField.description: Captures validation code / error messages from storm submissions
CustomField.label: Validation Code

value.fullName: Phone does not align to NMI/Meter
value.label: Phone does not align to NMI/Meter

value.fullName: Neither name nor phone number align to NMI/Meter
value.label: Neither name nor phone number align to NMI/Meter

value.fullName: NMI timeslice matching the customer details is older than 25 months
value.label: NMI timeslice matching the customer details is older than 25 months

value.fullName: NMI and METER exist but do not have a relationship with each other
value.label: NMI and METER exist but do not have a relationship with each other

value.fullName: Name does not align to NMI/Meter
value.label: Name does not align to NMI/Meter

value.fullName: METER is unsupported. Is not a remotely read Type 5 meter
value.label: METER is unsupported. Is not a remotely read Type 5 meter
